#debbugers# 

## Keys ##

- *l*(ist): Display 11 lines around the current line
- *s*(tep): Execute the current line and stop at the first possible location
- *n*(ext): Continue execution until the next line or end of the function 
- *b*(reak): Set a breakpoint
- p(rint): Evaluate the expression at the current level and print its content
- *r*(eturn): Continue execution until the current function return
- *q*(uit): quit the debugger
